PRICING.TITLE: Choose the perfect plan for your needs
PRICING.DESCRIPTION: Choose this plan to get started with our services.
PRICING.DEACTIVATE_PLAN_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to deactivate this plan?

PRICING_CREATE.TITLE: Create a new plan
PRICING_CREATE.DESCRIPTION: Create a new plan for your users to subscribe to.
PRICING_CREATE.NAME: Plan name
PRICING_CREATE.CREATE_PLAN_ERROR: An error occurred while creating the plan. Please try again.

PRICING_OVERVIEW.TITLE: Plan Overview
PRICING_OVERVIEW.DESCRIPTION:
Review the details of your selected plan and subscribe securely.
You can also subscribe with PayPal. If the button does not display correctly, please reload the page.
PRICING_OVERVIEW.UPDATE_SUBSCRIPTION_FAILED: An error occurred while updating the subscription. Please try again.

ACCOUNT.TITLE: Account settings
ACCOUNT.NO_ACTIVE_SUBSCRIPTION_DESCRIPTION: You currently do not have an active subscription.
ACCOUNT.PASSWORD_UPDATED_ERROR: An error occurred while updating your password. Please try again.
ACCOUNT.REQUIRED_FIELDS: Please fill in all required fields.
ACCOUNT.LANGUAGE_UPDATED_ERROR: An error occurred while updating the language. Please try again.

SIGNUP.TITLE: Create a free account
SIGNUP.CONFLIT: An account has already been created with this email address.
SIGNUP.ERROR_SIGNUP: An error occurred while creating your account. Please try again.
SIGNUP.TERMS_AGREEMENT: You must accept the terms and conditions to create an account.
SIGNUP.PASSWORD_MESSAGE: Password must be at least 6 characters long and contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character.
SIGNUP.PASSWORD_NUMBER: Password must contain at least one number.
SIGNUP.PASSWORD_UPPERCASE: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
SIGNUP.PASSWORD_SPECIAL: Password must contain at least one special character.

FORGOT_PASSWORD.TITLE: Reset your password
FORGOT_PASSWORD.ENTER_EMAIL: Enter your email address to receive a password reset link.

RESET_PASSWORD.TITLE: Set a new password
RESET_PASSWORD.EMAIL_SENT: A password reset link has been sent to your email address.
RESET_PASSWORD.EMAIL_SENT_ERROR: An error occurred while sending the password reset link. Please try again.

UNAUTHORIZED.TITLE: Unauthorized
UNAUTHORIZED.DESCRIPTION: Sorry, you are not authorized to access this page.

PROFILE_LOCK.TITLE: Please activate your account...
PROFILE_LOCK.MESSAGE: Thank you for registering! Please check your inbox and click on the activation link to activate your account. Once your account has been activated, you will be able to access your personal space.

NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Page Not Found
NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: The page you are looking for might have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable.

SUBSCRIPTION_SUCCESS.TITLE: Subscription Successful!
SUBSCRIPTION_SUCCESS.MESSAGE: Thank you for subscribing! You will now receive updates and exclusive content directly in your inbox.
SUBSCRIPTION_SUCCESS.NOTE: The subscription may take a few seconds to take effect. Please reload your page to verify that the subscription has been applied correctly.
